name: df-dvds
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cdvds, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz)), wrex(s2, cz, wceq(co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
comment: Define the divides relation, see definition in [ApostolNT] p. 14. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 21-Mar-2011.)
